alert.note: Alert for Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:54AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Suffolk and southeastern Nassau Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 653 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Farmingdale, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm is also producing lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Deer Park, Lindenhurst, Plainview, Massapequa, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma, Babylon, Farmingdale, Dix Hills, Bay Shore, Melville, Sayville and Amityville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southwest Suffolk
